metadata.title: CVE-2015-6816 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
ganglia-web before 3.7.1 allows remote attackers to bypass authentication.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6816` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ganglia-webfrontend - 3.7.5+debian-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ganglia-web package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.7.5+debian-1').
